data.description: The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of the RESTful Network API for Anonymous Customer Reference Management 1.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.

This document defines the requirements for OMA RESTful Network API for Anonymous Customer Reference Management in order to expose ACR management feature to 3rd party developers. The purpose is to provide RESTful Network API for Anonymous Customer Reference Management, meeting GSMA: “Rich Communication Ecosystem RCS-e Network API Detailed Requirements 1.0” [REQ_RCSe] and added improvements as per GSMA Access andOMA requirements.
This specification defines a RESTful API for Anonymous Customer Reference Management using HTTP protocol bindings.
